ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats the entire point behind the original poster s idea. IMO, its completely justifiable based on the time and effort required to obtain the armor. Galtin of
ygData.messageBody:
Thats the entire point behind the original poster's idea. IMO, its
completely justifiable based on the time and effort required to obtain the
armor.

Galtin of E'ci


can you imagine singing 3 chants with the drum effect and being able to dual
wield yaks? plus you'd be able to mix instrument song types and get the
maximum usage out of the songs without having to switch instruments and at
the same time have the bonus of using weapons.
